languages.text: "Рядовые члены культа — оскверненные {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагом{/g} люди, предатели {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} и пособники Хаоса. Участие в ритуалах культа не проходит без промывки мозгов, буквальной или фигуральной — чем дольше они среди других культистов, тем меньше критичность их мышления и тем ближе они к покорным скотам, которые лишены страха и инстинкта самосохранения. Худшие из них идут на смерть без тени сомнения, готовые забрать с собой сотни и тысячи душ".

traits.locale_text: "Рядовые члены культа — оскверненные {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагом{/g} люди, предатели {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} и пособники Хаоса. Участие в ритуалах Культа не проходит без промывки мозгов, буквальной или фигуральной — чем дольше они среди других культистов, тем меньше критичность их мышления и тем ближе они к покорным скотам, которые лишены страха и инстинкта самосохранения. Худшие из них идут на смерть без тени сомнения, готовые забрать с собой сотни и тысячи душ".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "The cult's ordinary members are humans who have been corrupted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, traitors to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and accomplices of Chaos. Participation in the cult's rituals always entails brainwashing, literally and figuratively. The longer cult members spend among other cultists, the less critically they think and the more closely they resemble obedient livestock, stripped of their fear and instinct for self-preservation. The worst of them go to their deaths without an inkling of doubt, ready to take hundreds and thousands of souls with them."
languages.original_text: "Рядовые члены культа — оскверненные {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврагом{/g} люди, предатели {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} и пособники Хаоса. Участие в ритуалах культа не проходит без промывки мозгов, буквальной или фигуральной — чем дольше они среди других культистов, тем меньше критичность их мышления и тем ближе они к покорным скотам, которые лишены страха и инстинкта самосохранения. Худшие из них идут на смерть без тени сомнения, готовые забрать с собой сотни и тысячи душ".

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这支教派的普通成员包括遭到{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}腐化的人类、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的叛徒，以及混沌的帮凶。邪教举行的仪式一定会伴随着洗脑的过程，无论是象征意义上的，还是字面意义上的。邪教成员与其他邪教徒相处的时间越久，他们的思考能力就越差，也会变得越像是听话的牲畜，失去了恐惧与自我保护的本能。他们之中被洗脑最严重的那些，甚至可以毫不犹豫地去死。那群人随时做好了准备，打算带上成百上千人的灵魂，与他们一起上路。”
languages.original_text: "The cult's ordinary members are humans who have been corrupted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, traitors to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and accomplices of Chaos. Participation in the cult's rituals always entails brainwashing, literally and figuratively. The longer cult members spend among other cultists, the less critically they think and the more closely they resemble obedient livestock, stripped of their fear and instinct for self-preservation. The worst of them go to their deaths without an inkling of doubt, ready to take hundreds and thousands of souls with them."

traits.locale_text: “这支教派的普通成员包括遭到{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}腐化的人类、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的叛徒，以及混沌的帮凶。邪教举行的仪式一定会伴随着洗脑的过程，无论是象征意义上的，还是字面意义上的。邪教成员与其他邪教徒相处的时间越久，他们的思考能力就越差，也会变得越像是听话的牲畜，失去了恐惧与自我保护的本能。他们之中被洗脑最严重的那些，甚至可以毫不犹豫地去死。那群人随时做好了准备，打算带上成百上千人的灵魂，与他们一起上路。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "The cult's ordinary members are humans who have been corrupted by the Archenemy, traitors to the Imperium, and accomplices of Chaos. Participation in the cult's rituals always entails brainwashing, literally and figuratively. The longer cult members spend among other cultists, the less critically they think and the more closely they resemble obedient livestock, stripped of their fear and instinct for self-preservation. The worst of them go to their deaths without an inkling of doubt, ready to take hundreds and thousands of souls with them."

languages.text: «Los miembros básicos de la secta son humanos corrompidos por el {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, traidores al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} y cómplices del Caos. La participación en los rituales del culto siempre conlleva un lavado de cerebro, literal y figurado. Cuanto más tiempo pasen los miembros junto a otros sectarios, más se reduce su capacidad de pensamiento crítico y más se asemejan al ganado domesticado, sin rastro de miedo ni instinto de supervivencia. Los más afectados marchan hacia sus muertes sin la más mínima duda, listos para llevarse a cientos y miles de almas con ellos».
languages.original_text: "The cult's ordinary members are humans who have been corrupted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, traitors to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and accomplices of Chaos. Participation in the cult's rituals always entails brainwashing, literally and figuratively. The longer cult members spend among other cultists, the less critically they think and the more closely they resemble obedient livestock, stripped of their fear and instinct for self-preservation. The worst of them go to their deaths without an inkling of doubt, ready to take hundreds and thousands of souls with them."

traits.locale_text: «Los miembros básicos de la secta son humanos corrompidos por el {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}, traidores al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} y cómplices del Caos. La participación en los rituales del culto siempre conlleva un lavado de cerebro, literal y figurado. Cuanto más tiempo pasen los miembros junto a otros sectarios, más se reduce su capacidad de pensamiento crítico y más se asemejan al ganado domesticado, sin rastro de miedo ni instinto de supervivencia. Los más afectados marchan hacia sus muertes sin la más mínima duda, listos para llevarse a cientos y miles de almas con ellos».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「教団の普通のメンバーは、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}に堕落させられた人間、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の裏切り者、渾沌の共犯者だ。教団の儀式に参加することは、文字通りの意味でも比喩的な意味でも、常に洗脳を伴う。団員は、他の団員の中で過ごす時間が長ければ長いほど、批判的な思考をしなくなり、恐怖心や自衛本能を取り除かれた従順な家畜になっていくのだ。最悪、疑念を抱くこともなく、何百、何千もの魂を道連れにする覚悟で死に向かうこととなる」
languages.original_text: "The cult's ordinary members are humans who have been corrupted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, traitors to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and accomplices of Chaos. Participation in the cult's rituals always entails brainwashing, literally and figuratively. The longer cult members spend among other cultists, the less critically they think and the more closely they resemble obedient livestock, stripped of their fear and instinct for self-preservation. The worst of them go to their deaths without an inkling of doubt, ready to take hundreds and thousands of souls with them."

traits.locale_text: 「教団の普通のメンバーは、{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}に堕落させられた人間、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の裏切り者、渾沌の共犯者だ。教団の儀式に参加することは、文字通りの意味でも比喩的な意味でも、常に洗脳を伴う。団員は、他の団員の中で過ごす時間が長ければ長いほど、批判的な思考をしなくなり、恐怖心や自衛本能を取り除かれた従順な家畜になっていくのだ。最悪、疑念を抱くこともなく、何百、何千もの魂を道連れにする覚悟で死に向かうこととなる」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Die einfachen Mitglieder des Kults sind Menschen, die vom {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g} korrumpiert wurden, Verräter am {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Verbündete des Chaos. Die Teilnahme an den Ritualen des Kults beinhaltet immer auch eine Gehirnwäsche, sowohl im wörtlichen als auch im übertragenen Sinn. Je länger die Mitglieder von anderen Kultisten umgeben sind, desto mehr verlieren sie ihr kritisches Denkvermögen und beginnen, gehorsamem Vieh zu ähneln, dem jede Furcht und jeder Selbsterhaltungstrieb genommen wurden. Die Schlimmsten gehen ohne einen Hauch des Zweifels in den eigenen Tod, bereit, hunderte und tausende von Seelen mitzureißen."
languages.original_text: "The cult's ordinary members are humans who have been corrupted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, traitors to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and accomplices of Chaos. Participation in the cult's rituals always entails brainwashing, literally and figuratively. The longer cult members spend among other cultists, the less critically they think and the more closely they resemble obedient livestock, stripped of their fear and instinct for self-preservation. The worst of them go to their deaths without an inkling of doubt, ready to take hundreds and thousands of souls with them."

traits.locale_text: "Die einfachen Mitglieder des Kults sind Menschen, die vom {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeind{/g} korrumpiert wurden, Verräter am {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, Verbündete des Chaos. Die Teilnahme an den Ritualen des Kults beinhaltet immer auch eine Gehirnwäsche, sowohl im wörtlichen als auch im übertragenen Sinn. Je länger die Mitglieder von anderen Kultisten umgeben sind, desto mehr verlieren sie ihr kritisches Denkvermögen und beginnen, gehorsamem Vieh zu ähneln, dem jede Furcht und jeder Selbsterhaltungstrieb genommen wurden. Die Schlimmsten gehen ohne einen Hauch des Zweifels in den eigenen Tod, bereit, hunderte und tausende von Seelen mitzureißen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Les membres ordinaires du culte sont des humains corrompus par le {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, des traîtres à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} et des complices du Chaos. Les rituels impliquent un lavage de cerveau, au sens propre comme au sens figuré. Plus les membres du culte passent de temps entre eux, plus leur esprit critique se délite et plus ils s'apparentent à un troupeau de braves bêtes obéissantes, dépourvues aussi bien de peur que de l'instinct de survie. Les plus radicaux d'entre eux n'émettront pas la moindre objection à se sacrifier si tant est que ça leur permette d'emporter des milliers d'âmes avec eux. »
languages.original_text: "The cult's ordinary members are humans who have been corrupted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, traitors to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and accomplices of Chaos. Participation in the cult's rituals always entails brainwashing, literally and figuratively. The longer cult members spend among other cultists, the less critically they think and the more closely they resemble obedient livestock, stripped of their fear and instinct for self-preservation. The worst of them go to their deaths without an inkling of doubt, ready to take hundreds and thousands of souls with them."

traits.locale_text: « Les membres ordinaires du culte sont des humains corrompus par le {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, des traîtres à l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} et des complices du Chaos. Les rituels impliquent un lavage de cerveau, au sens propre comme au sens figuré. Plus les membres du culte passent de temps entre eux, plus leur esprit critique se délite et plus ils s'apparentent à un troupeau de braves bêtes obéissantes, dépourvues aussi bien de peur que de l'instinct de survie. Les plus radicaux d'entre eux n'émettront pas la moindre objection à se sacrifier si tant est que ça leur permette d'emporter des milliers d'âmes avec eux. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Tarikatın genelini {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} yozlaştırdığı {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} düşmanı, Kaos'un yardakçısı insanlar oluşturur. Ayinlerinden beyin yıkama eksik olmaz. Hem gerçek hem de mecazi anlamda. Tarikatçılar birbirleriyle vakit geçirdikçe eleştirel düşünce yetilerini kaybeder, güdülecek hayvanlardan farksız hâle gelirler. Korkularından, nefsi müdafaa duygularından azledilirler. Öyleleri vardır ki zerre şüphe duymadan, beraberinde binlerce ruhu da götürmeye hazır hâlde ölüme gider."
languages.original_text: "The cult's ordinary members are humans who have been corrupted by the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, traitors to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, and accomplices of Chaos. Participation in the cult's rituals always entails brainwashing, literally and figuratively. The longer cult members spend among other cultists, the less critically they think and the more closely they resemble obedient livestock, stripped of their fear and instinct for self-preservation. The worst of them go to their deaths without an inkling of doubt, ready to take hundreds and thousands of souls with them."

traits.locale_text: "Tarikatın genelini {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın yozlaştırdığı {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g} düşmanı, Kaos'un yardakçısı insanlar oluşturur. Ayinlerinden beyin yıkama eksik olmaz. Hem gerçek hem de mecazi anlamda. Tarikatçılar birbirleriyle vakit geçirdikçe eleştirel düşünce yetilerini kaybeder, güdülecek hayvanlardan farksız hâle gelirler. Korkularından, nefsi müdafaa duygularından azledilirler. Öyleleri vardır ki zerre şüphe duymadan, beraberinde binlerce ruhu götürmeye hazır hâlde ölüme gider."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
